title: Ticket #319: Move "scripts as executables" code into Create_Process()
description: As the summary says: move "scripts as executables" code into Create_Process(), so that it works for any code path that calls Create_Process().
remarks:
2009-Mar-12 18:03:58 by burnett:
The code can't all be moved to Create_Process(). Like *.{bat,cmd} files, VanillaProc::StartJob() (condor_starter.V6.1\vanilla_proc.cpp) needs to do some file renaming to get Create_Process() to behave correctly (i.e. reset the file extension, since we blindly rename all job executables to condor_exec.exe on Windows.)
